Class ErrorDocumentImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.taverna.reference.impl.AbstractEntityImpl
      • org.apache.taverna.reference.impl.ErrorDocumentImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ErrorDocument, HibernateMappedEntity, Identified

    public class ErrorDocumentImpl
extends AbstractEntityImpl
implements ErrorDocument, HibernateMappedEntity
    Simple bean implementation of ErrorDocument
    Author:
    Tom Oinn

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Set<T2Reference> getErrorReferences()
      If the error document is created from set of references that contain error documents, this method returns them.
      Set getErrorReferenceSet()
      Used by Hibernate to bodge around problems with interface types in the API
      String getExceptionMessage()
      If the error document is created from a Throwable, this contains the message part of the Throwable.
      String getMessage()
      Error documents can carry an arbitrary string message, this returns it.
      List getStackTraceList()
      Used by Hibernate to bodge around problems with interface types in the API
